recipe.title: Texas Toast with Roasted Tomatoes and Parsley
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste
6 thick slices white sandwich bread (such as pullman), toasted
instructions: Preheat broiler. Arrange tomatoes in a single layer on a rimmed baking sheet and season with salt. Broil tomatoes until tender and beginning to burst, 4–5 minutes. Gently smash tomatoes with a wooden spoon. Melt butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, until light golden, 30–60 seconds. Remove from heat. Stir in parsley and 1/2 tsp. salt. Brush toasts with garlic butter and top with smashed tomatoes. Serve hot.
